body:
@zou3519 ok, thanks!
It's interesting that `getSize` returns an `int` only, given that [`size_` can be `int64_t` as well](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/THCDeviceTensor.cuh#L49-L51), but I suppose that it should be fine?
But `BatchNormalization` is implemented as you do, so I'm ok with leaving as is.
Also, one last nit: [`count` is `int64_t](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2737/files#diff-9c126d68263401b0b75b3405e8cb5787R58), but it's defined as [`int`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2737/files#diff-81eb64f9cec28e6c00aa932646c0d88fR86). Should we care? (Sorry, I'm just being annoying here :) )
